scenes.dialogue_vo: Yapay sinir ağları insan gibi mi öğrenir? 30 saniyede cevap veriyorum — hazır mısın?
scenes.on_screen_text:
HOOK: Yapay sinir ağları insan gibi öğrenir mi?
30 saniyede görelim. ▶️

scenes.dialogue_vo: Önce temel: Yapay Zeka = insan benzeri düşünme hedefi. Makine Öğrenmesi = veriden öğrenme. Yapay Sinir Ağları = beyin esinli, örüntüleri yakalayan modeller.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Tanımlar:
YZ: Bilgisayarların insan benzeri düşünmesi
MO: Deneyimle öğrenen YZ alt dalı
YSA: Beyne benzer yapı, örüntü ve öğrenme

Görsel: Expanding Brain -> Perceptron → MLP → Deep Learning

scenes.dialogue_vo: Perceptron = tek nöron. Katmanlar birleştirince MLP olur. Basit bir perceptron Python kodu 3 satırda:
scenes.on_screen_text:
Perceptron (şema):
input x -> w·x + b -> activation

Kod (Python, basit):

```python
import numpy as np
y = np.where(np.dot(w, x)+b>0, 1, 0)
```

scenes.dialogue_vo: Öğrenme stratejileri: Öğretmenli — etiketli veriyle, Destekleyici — ödül-ceza ile, Öğretmensiz — gruplaştırma/örüntü keşfi. Hangi probleme göre seçersin, o işler.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Öğrenme Stratejileri:
- Öğretmenli (Supervised): Etiketli veri
- Destekleyici (Reinforcement): Ödül/ceza ile öğrenme
- Öğretmensiz (Unsupervised): Kümelenme, örüntü keşfi

İpucu: Açıklanabilirlik ↔ Doğruluk takası

scenes.dialogue_vo: Öğrenme kuralları: Hebb — aynı anda ateşlenirse bağ artar. Delta (Widrow‑Hoff) — hata düzeltme, denetimli öğrenme. Kohonen — rekabetçi, kümelenme için winner-takes-all.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Öğrenme Kuralları:
Hebb: Δw = η · x · y
Delta: Δw = η · (d - y) · x
Kohonen: Rekabetçi öğrenme (Winner-Takes-All)

Kısa: Hebb = ilişkilendirir, Delta = hata düzeltir

scenes.dialogue_vo: Modern YSA'ların sırrı: Geriye yayılım. Hata geriye akıp ağırlıkları güncelliyor. PyTorch'ta 3 satırla model ve basit eğitim döngüsü şöyle:
scenes.on_screen_text:
Geriye Yayılım (Backprop) — Özet
1) Forward: tahmin
2) Loss: hata hesapla
3) Backward: gradyan hesapla
4) Update: ağırlıkları güncelle

Kod (PyTorch, özet):

```python
model = nn.Sequential(nn.Linear(10,50), nn.ReLU(), nn.Linear(50,2))
loss = nn.CrossEntropyLoss()
for x,y in data:
    y_hat = model(x)
    l = loss(y_hat,y); l.backward(); opt.step(); opt.zero_grad()
```

scenes.dialogue_vo: Uzman sistemler kural tabanlı, şeffaf ama esnek değil. YSA veriyle öğrenir, esnek ama açıklaması zor. Projeye göre seç: kurallar mı yoksa veri mi?
scenes.on_screen_text:
Uzman Sistem vs YSA:
- Uzman Sistem: Kurallı, açıklanabilir
- YSA: Veriyle öğrenir, güçlü ama 'kara kutu' olabilir

Meme label: Karar anı: YSA mı, Uzman Sistem mi?

scenes.dialogue_vo: Diğer araçlar: Genetik Algoritmalar optimizasyon için 'doğal seçilim'. Bulanık mantık belirsizliği yönetir. Zeki etmenler bağımsız karar verir ve çevreyle etkileşir.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Diğer YZ Teknolojileri:
- Genetik Algoritma: Seçim → Crossover → Mutasyon
- Bulanık Mantık: Belirsiz bilgiyle başa çıkma
- Zeki Etmenler: Bağımsız, çevreyle etkileşim

GA mini-şema:
1) Popülasyon
2) Seçilim
3) Crossover
4) Mutasyon

scenes.dialogue_vo: Kullanım alanları: OCR, tıbbi görüntü analizi, veri madenciliği... Gerçekten her yerde. Hızlı örnek komutları:
scenes.on_screen_text:
Uygulama Örnekleri:
- OCR: pytesseract
- Tıbbi Analiz: görüntü sınıflandırma
- Veri Madenciliği: büyük veri örüntüleri

Komut/Örnek:

```bash
pip install pytesseract
python -m pytesseract input.png
```

Python (pandas):
```python
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('data.csv')
print(df.head())
```

scenes.dialogue_vo: Kısa tarih: 1970'lerde duraklama oldu ama algoritmalar ve donanım geliştikçe YSA yeniden yükseldi. Bugün derin ağlar günlük hayatın parçası.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Kısa Tarihçe:
- 1970: AI kışı
- 1990-2000: Algoritma gelişmeleri
- 2010+: GPU'larla Derin Öğrenme patlaması

Sonuç: Teori→Pratik, şimdi her yerde

scenes.dialogue_vo: Kısa karar rehberi: Hebb = ilişkilendirme/associative. Delta = denetimli hata düzeltme. Kohonen = kümelenme/haritalama. Projenin hedefi karar verdirir.
scenes.on_screen_text:
Hangi Kural?
- Hebb: Associative learning (ör. hafıza modelleri)
- Delta: Supervised learning (hata düzeltme)
- Kohonen: Unsupervised clustering / self-organizing maps

Notebook: 'Hebb_vs_Delta.ipynb' (örnek)

scenes.dialogue_vo: Özet: YSA'lar insan gibi 'anlamaz' — istatistiksel örüntü öğrenir. Daha derine dalmak istiyorsan takip et, repo'yu indir, notebook'lara bak. Yeni videolarda görüşürüz!
scenes.on_screen_text:
Özet:
YSA = İNSAN GİBİ DEĞİL
→ Veri tabanlı, örüntüsel öğrenme

Daha fazla? Takip et ✅  Beğen ❤️  Repo: github.com/yourusername/yz-notes

Komut (örnek):
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/yz-notes.git
```

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 1 - Hook: Yapay sinir ağları insan gibi mi öğrenir?

asset.description: Camera starts in an uncomfortably tight close‑up of a plastic brain model sitting on a messy office desk, lit only by a violently flickering RGB gaming keyboard. A person in oversized blue light glasses lunges into frame from the left, dramatically whispering into the brain as if it were a microphone, then impatiently taps a cheap digital kitchen timer that’s duct‑taped to the brain’s side. As the timer instantly jumps to 00:30, the person points both index fingers at the camera, mouthing a silent "hazır mısın?" while confetti made of shredded printouts of neural network diagrams slowly rains down from above. The camera abruptly whip‑zooms out to reveal that the whole setup is actually on a treadmill running at full speed, with the desk wobbling wildly but the brain staying perfectly centered in frame as the shot ends.

bgm: Fast, playful electronic beat with light tension, TikTok‑style hook energy, 120–130 BPM.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 2 - Temel tanımlar: YZ, MO, YSA

asset.description: A wide shot opens on a classroom where three life‑size cardboard cutouts stand in a row: one of a Greek philosopher holding a laptop labeled "YZ", one of a scientist in a lab coat labeled "MO", and one of a cartoon brain with sunglasses labeled "YSA". A very serious person in formal suit wheels each cutout forward on squeaky office chairs, gesturing to them like a game‑show host while desperately pointing at hastily taped Post‑it notes with the definitions scribbled in marker. The camera slowly dollies closer as the host pulls out a tiny remote and, with exaggerated seriousness, presses it so that cheap fairy‑lights around the "YSA" brain cutout flash randomly. As they raise their hands in a mock "mind blown" gesture, the background wall projector silently cycles through an expanding‑brain meme slideshow labeled in Comic Sans as Perceptron → MLP → Deep Learning, slightly misaligned with the wall so part of it spills onto the ceiling.

bgm: Light nerdy lo‑fi hip‑hop with subtle chiptune bleeps, calm but curious mood.

asset.description: The camera starts overhead on a kitchen table where a single grape sits in the center of a white plate, labeled with a sticky note that says "input x". A hand slides in from the right and dramatically places a rusty metal spoon next to it labeled "w", then slowly balances a sugar cube on top labeled "b". As the camera tilts down to a side angle, the hand suddenly flicks the spoon so the grape rolls across a printed A4 paper with the formula w·x + b in huge letters, stopping exactly on a crudely hand‑drawn line reading "activation". The shot abruptly cuts to a laptop screen where a terminal window shows three lines of Python perceptron code enlarged to absurd size; the camera leans in shakily as the cursor highlights each line while an unseen finger taps the screen repeatedly, leaving smudge marks that catch the reflection of a ceiling fan circling lazily overhead.

bgm: Minimal glitchy electronic with soft clicks and subtle tension, to feel a bit "coder" but light.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 4 - Öğrenme stratejileri: supervised, RL, unsupervised

asset.description: A static medium shot shows three nearly identical houseplants lined up on a windowsill, each in a different mug labeled with masking tape: "Öğretmenli", "Destekleyici", and "Öğretmensiz". A person in pajama pants but a lab coat kneels in front of them and, in a solemn sequence, first gently places gold‑star stickers on the supervised plant whenever they water it exactly to a marked line, then turns to the reinforcement plant, spinning a tiny toy roulette wheel taped to the pot before deciding whether to water or not. For the unsupervised plant, they put on a blindfold, spin around three times, and randomly sprinkle water in the vague direction of the pots, getting half of it on the windowsill. The camera slowly zooms in as the person consults an absurdly complex hand‑drawn "Açıklanabilirlik ↔ Doğruluk" scale stuck to the wall with duct tape, then finally just shrugs directly into the lens while holding up all three plants at once in a shaky close‑up.

bgm: Quirky, mid‑tempo pizzicato‑style track with a light academic/comedic feel.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 5 - Öğrenme kuralları: Hebb, Delta, Kohonen

asset.description: On a cluttered whiteboard in a dim office, three badly drawn stick‑figure neurons are labeled with crooked Post‑its: "Hebb", "Delta" and "Kohonen". The camera starts in a shaky handheld close‑up of Hebb as a person off‑screen repeatedly smacks two cheap fridge magnets together on the board whenever the stick figures’ eyes are both colored in, muttering approval while scribbling Δw = η·x·y underneath in enormous messy letters. The view pans abruptly to Delta, where the same person now wears a referee whistle and dramatically erases and re‑draws a massive red "error" bar with each pass, pumping their fist every time they shorten it while writing Δw = η·(d − y)·x in the cramped corner. Finally, the camera swings to Kohonen where several colored sticky notes with tiny neurons sketched on them are arranged in a grid; the person slams their palm down so one sticky note jumps forward onto the desk, then ceremoniously crowns it with a paper cutout reading "Winner‑Takes‑All" as the other stickies sadly peel and droop in the background.

bgm: Rhythmic, slightly tense electronic with a "chalkboard" academic vibe, but still playful.

asset.description: A close‑up of a tangled ball of multicolored yarn fills the frame, each strand tagged with tiny paper labels like "w1", "w2", and "bias". A pair of anxious hands in fingerless gloves starts pulling one end of the yarn forward across a table cluttered with printed arrows labeled "forward", threading it through a maze of empty coffee cups arranged as layers. The camera tracks the yarn as it snakes through the cups and spits out onto a post‑it labeled "loss", where a small toy alarm light begins flashing red. Immediately, the hands reverse direction, frantically rewinding the yarn back through the cups in the opposite direction over arrows now scribbled "backward" in red marker. The shot cuts hard to a laptop screen displaying a PyTorch training loop in a text editor; the cursor slowly drags across the line `l.backward(); opt.step(); opt.zero_grad()` as the reflection in the screen reveals the operator wearing a bicycle helmet indoors for no clear reason.

bgm: Driving but soft techno/house beat, "coding session" mood, steady and focused.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 7 - Uzman Sistem vs YSA karar anı (meme)

asset.description: Use the classic "Distracted Boyfriend" meme template. Label the boyfriend as "Mühendis", the girlfriend he is turning away from as "Uzman Sistem (Kurallı, açıklanabilir)", and the woman he is looking at as "YSA (Veriyle öğrenen kara kutu)". Add top text: "Proje: Basit kurallar yeter" and bottom text: "Ben: 'Ya yine de bi deep learning denesek mi?'"

bgm: Bouncy, light trap or meme‑y hip‑hop beat to sell the internet meme vibe.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 8 - Diğer YZ teknolojileri (GA, bulanık, etmenler)

asset.description: The camera opens on a kitchen counter where a plastic bowl is filled with an assortment of mismatched LEGO figures and paper slips, each labeled with random parameter strings like "lr=0.01" or "mutation=0.3". A person in rubber gloves dramatically scoops out a few figures, lines them up as a "population" in front of hand‑drawn arrows on butcher paper marked "Seçilim → Crossover → Mutasyon", and then smashes two of the figures together so their heads swap, carefully sticking on a new label that simply reads "çalışır gibi". The shot pans to a fogged bathroom mirror where the same person, now wearing sunglasses in the shower with clothes on, draws vague fuzzy boundaries labeled "az", "orta", "çok" around temperature icons with a dripping finger while a rubber duck watches from the faucet. Finally, the camera cuts to a top‑down view of a messy living room floor where several Roomba‑sized cardboard circles labeled "Zeki Etmen" nervously bump into each other and a cat toy, each with speech bubbles taped on saying things like "çevre?" and "ajan hedef?", as the operator pushes them around with a broom from just off‑frame.

bgm: Upbeat experimental electronic with playful, "mad scientist" energy.

asset.description: A rapid montage begins with a close‑up of an old flatbed scanner lid being slammed shut on a crumpled receipt while a sticky note labeled "OCR" dangles off the edge; the camera wobbles as someone dramatically points a finger at a laptop running a terminal window with `pytesseract` commands barely visible. It smash‑cuts to an over‑zoomed shot of a medical textbook page showing a blurry brain scan, onto which the person has taped a red "Sınıflandır" stamp that they repeatedly press with mounting confusion. Another cut reveals a monitor displaying a messy spreadsheet; the person scrolls wildly in pandas DataFrame output while absentmindedly eating cereal straight from the box, some flakes landing on the keyboard in slow motion. The sequence ends with a janky top‑down view of the same desk now crowded with printed bash and Python code snippets taped everywhere, the camera slowly rotating as if orbiting the chaotic shrine to automation.

bgm: Energetic montage‑style EDM with quick risers and drops to match rapid cuts.

asset_plan.scene_name: Scene 10 - Kısa tarihçe ve AI kışı

asset.description: The scene opens on a poorly lit basement corner where a small space heater and a box fan both sit unplugged beside a dusty CRT monitor showing a screensaver of slowly freezing snowflakes; a calendar on the wall is stuck on "1970" and tipped at an awkward angle. The camera slowly zooms in as a hand dramatically flips the calendar pages in big jumps—"1990", "2000"—while someone off‑screen slaps Post‑it notes with words like "Yeni Algoritmalar" and "Daha Fazla Veri" onto the CRT frame. Suddenly, the hand slams down a bright red GPU graphics card on top of an ancient beige tower PC, held there with duct tape, and the monitor flickers violently before cutting to a blindingly bright desktop wallpaper full of deep network diagrams. The camera pulls back shakily to reveal fairy lights and random smartphone boxes scattered around the once‑gloomy basement as the same hand now waves a smartphone running a face‑filter app in front of the CRT, trying to get the old monitor to recognize as a face.

bgm: Retro‑to‑modern evolution track: start with cold, sparse synth pad then build into a warm, upbeat electronic groove.

asset.description: A cluttered study desk is covered with three dramatically lit index cards arranged in a row under a cheap desk lamp, each card labeled in thick marker: "Hebb", "Delta", and "Kohonen". The camera starts in a tight close‑up on a notebook titled "Hebb_vs_Delta.ipynb" handwritten on the cover; a pencil‑holding hand flips it open with an overly theatrical flourish to reveal a messy decision flowchart that only leads to those three names. As the camera tracks sideways, the hand switches to holding a tiny toy gavel, tapping each card in turn: for Hebb, they pile up Polaroid photos labeled "hatıra" around it; for Delta, they dramatically scribble "Hata" in red above the card and then cross it out with a ruler‑straight line; for Kohonen, they slide a cluster of multicolored pushpins across a corkboard into satisfying little map‑like groups. The shot ends with a hesitant fingertip hovering over the three cards in a circular motion before finally poking one, at which point all three wobble slightly as if equally offended.

bgm: Calm but slightly suspenseful lo‑fi beat, "decision time" atmosphere.

asset.description: The camera opens on a dramatic close‑up of a human face mask made of cardboard, propped on a stand next to a cheap calculator covered in tangled earphones; a sticky note on the mask screams "İNSAN" while the calculator wears a note saying "YSA". A hand abruptly reaches in, rips off the "İNSAN" label from the calculator and slaps on a new one that reads "Sadece Örüntü" in messy capitals. The shot widens to reveal a laptop screen behind them displaying a giant text overlay "YSA ≠ İnsan" while the desktop is cluttered with icons labeled "repo", "notebooks", and "yeni_video_final_final_v7". The camera then tilts down to the terminal where the `git clone https://github.com/yourusername/yz-notes.git` command is already typed, and an overly dramatic finger slowly presses Enter in extreme close‑up. As lines of fake clone output scroll, the person spins the chair around to face the camera, points at an off‑center "Takip et" sticky note stuck directly onto the lens, and gives an exaggerated thumbs‑up that partially blocks the entire frame.

bgm: Feel‑good, inspirational electronic track with a clear resolution and outro vibe.

voice_timing.text: Yapay sinir ağları insan gibi mi öğrenir? 30 saniyede cevap veriyorum — hazır mısın?
Önce temel: Yapay Zeka = insan benzeri düşünme hedefi. Makine Öğrenmesi = veriden öğrenme. Yapay Sinir Ağları = beyin esinli, örüntüleri yakalayan modeller.
Perceptron = tek nöron. Katmanlar birleştirince MLP olur. Basit bir perceptron Python kodu 3 satırda:
Öğrenme stratejileri: Öğretmenli — etiketli veriyle, Destekleyici — ödül-ceza ile, Öğretmensiz — gruplaştırma/örüntü keşfi. Hangi probleme göre seçersin, o işler.
Öğrenme kuralları: Hebb — aynı anda ateşlenirse bağ artar. Delta (Widrow‑Hoff) — hata düzeltme, denetimli öğrenme. Kohonen — rekabetçi, kümelenme için winner-takes-all.
Modern YSA'ların sırrı: Geriye yayılım. Hata geriye akıp ağırlıkları güncelliyor. PyTorch'ta 3 satırla model ve basit eğitim döngüsü şöyle:
Uzman sistemler kural tabanlı, şeffaf ama esnek değil. YSA veriyle öğrenir, esnek ama açıklaması zor. Projeye göre seç: kurallar mı yoksa veri mi?
Diğer araçlar: Genetik Algoritmalar optimizasyon için 'doğal seçilim'. Bulanık mantık belirsizliği yönetir. Zeki etmenler bağımsız karar verir ve çevreyle etkileşir.
Kullanım alanları: OCR, tıbbi görüntü analizi, veri madenciliği... Gerçekten her yerde. Hızlı örnek komutları:
Kısa tarih: 1970'lerde duraklama oldu ama algoritmalar ve donanım geliştikçe YSA yeniden yükseldi. Bugün derin ağlar günlük hayatın parçası.
Kısa karar rehberi: Hebb = ilişkilendirme/associative. Delta = denetimli hata düzeltme. Kohonen = kümelenme/haritalama. Projenin hedefi karar verdirir.
Özet: YSA'lar insan gibi 'anlamaz' — istatistiksel örüntü öğrenir. Daha derine dalmak istiyorsan takip et, repo'yu indir, notebook'lara bak. Yeni videolarda görüşürüz!
